meanings.definition: A person who mends or repairs things.
meanings.sent1: The melder fixed my broken toy.
meanings.sent2: The melder repaired the leaky faucet.
meanings.sent3: The melder joked that even toys need a doctor sometimes.
meanings.sent4: Her skill as a melder transformed the broken into whole.
meanings.sent5: The melder's hands worked magic on the torn fabric.

meanings.definition: A group of people who come together to work on a common project.
meanings.sent1: Our team of melders completed the puzzle together.
meanings.sent2: The melder group painted the mural on the wall.
meanings.sent3: The melders laughed and chatted while fixing the fence.
meanings.sent4: The melders were like a well-oiled machine, each part essential.
meanings.sent5: The melders' unity made the task seem effortless.
